title: Sentence Correction (修改病句)
description: Learn to identify and correct common errors in Chinese sentences
description_zh: 学习识别和纠正中文句子中的常见错误

sections.title: Common Error Types
sections.content: Learn to spot: word order errors (词序错误), missing components (成分残缺), redundancy (重复累赘), wrong collocations (搭配不当).
sections.content_zh: 学会发现：词序错误、成分残缺、重复累赘、搭配不当。

sections.title: Word Order
sections.content: Remember: Time + Subject + Place + Manner + Verb + Object. Common mistakes: placing time/place incorrectly.
sections.content_zh: 记住：时间 + 主语 + 地点 + 方式 + 动词 + 宾语。常见错误：错误放置时间/地点。

sections.title: Word Collocation
sections.content: Some words naturally go together: 提高水平 (not 增加水平), 改进方法 (not 改进水平).
sections.content_zh: 有些词语自然搭配：提高水平（不是增加水平）、改进方法（不是改进水平）。

exercises.question: Which is the correct word order?
exercises.explanation: Time (昨天) comes at beginning or after subject
exercises.explanation_zh: 时间（昨天）放在开头或主语后
